fields.name: id
fields.description: The user's Facebook ID. No `access_token` required. `string`.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The user's full name. No `access_token` required. `string`.

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The user's first name. No `access_token` required. `string`.

fields.name: middle_name
fields.description: The user's middle name. No `access_token` required.  `string`.

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The user's last name. No `access_token` required.  `string`.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: The user's gender: `female` or `male`.  No `access_token` required. `string`.

fields.name: locale
fields.description: The user's locale. No `access_token` required. `string` containing the ISO Language Code and ISO Country Code.

fields.name: languages
fields.description: The user's languages. `user_likes`. `array` of objects containing language `id` and `name`.

fields.name: link
fields.description: The URL of the profile for the user on Facebook. No `access_token` required. `string` containing a valid URL.

fields.name: username
fields.description: The user's Facebook username. No `access_token` required. `string`.

fields.name: third_party_id
fields.description: An anonymous, but unique identifier for the user; only returned if specifically requested via the `fields` URL parameter. Requires `access_token`. `string`.

fields.name: installed
fields.description: Specifies whether the user has installed the application associated with the app access token that is used to make the request; only returned if specifically requested via the `fields` URL parameter. Requires app `access_token`. `object` containing `type` (this is always "user"), `id` (the ID of the user), and optional `installed` field (always `true` if returned); The `installed` field is only returned if the user has installed the application, otherwise it is not part of the returned object.

fields.name: timezone
fields.description: The user's timezone offset from UTC. Available only for the current user.  `number`.

fields.name: updated_time
fields.description: The last time the user's profile was updated; changes to the `languages`, `link`, `timezone`, `verified`, `interested_in`, `favorite_athletes`, `favorite_teams`, and `video_upload_limits` are not not reflected in this value. Requires `access_token`. `string` containing an ISO-8601 datetime.

fields.name: verified
fields.description: The user's account verification status, either `true` or `false` (see below). Requires `access_token`.  `boolean`.

fields.name: bio
fields.description: The user's biography. `user_about_me` or `friends_about_me`. `string`.

fields.name: birthday
fields.description: The user's birthday. `user_birthday` or `friends_birthday`. Date `string` in `MM/DD/YYYY` format.

fields.name: education
fields.description: A list of the user's education history. `user_education_history` or `friends_education_history`. `array` of objects containing `year` and `type` fields, and `school` object (`name`,  `id`, `type`, and optional `year`, `degree`, `concentration` array, `classes` array, and `with` array ).

fields.name: email
fields.description: The proxied or contact email address granted by the user. `email`. `string` containing a valid RFC822 email address.

fields.name: hometown
fields.description: The user's hometown. `user_hometown` or `friends_hometown`. object containing `name` and `id`.

fields.name: interested_in
fields.description: The genders the user is interested in. `user_relationship_details` or `friends_relationship_details`. `array` containing strings.

fields.name: location
fields.description: The user's current city. `user_location` or `friends_location`.  object containing `name` and `id`.

fields.name: political
fields.description: The user's political view. `user_religion_politics` or `friends_religion_politics`. `string`.

fields.name: favorite_athletes
fields.description: The user's favorite athletes; this field is deprecated and will be removed in the near future.  `user_likes` or `friends_likes` . `array` of objects containing `id` and `name` fields.

fields.name: favorite_teams
fields.description: The user's favorite teams; this field is deprecated and will be removed in the near future. `user_likes` or `friends_likes`. `array` of objects containing `id` and `name` fields.

fields.name: quotes
fields.description: The user's favorite quotes. `user_about_me` or `friends_about_me`. `string`.

fields.name: relationship_status
fields.description: The user's relationship status: `Single`, `In a relationship`, `Engaged`, `Married`, `It's complicated`, `In an open relationship`, `Widowed`, `Separated`, `Divorced`, `In a civil union`, `In a domestic partnership`. `user_relationships` or `friends_relationships`. `string`.

fields.name: religion
fields.description: The user's religion. `user_religion_politics` or `friends_religion_politics` . `string`.

fields.name: significant_other
fields.description: The user's significant other. `user_relationships` or `friends_relationships`.  object containing `name` and `id`.

fields.name: video_upload_limits
fields.description: The size of the video file and the length of the video that a user can upload; only returned if specifically requested via the `fields` URL parameter. Requires `access_token`.  object containing `length` and `size` of video.

fields.name: website
fields.description: The URL of the user's personal website. `user_website` or `friends_website` . `string` containing a valid URL.

fields.name: work
fields.description: A list of the user's work history. `user_work_history` or `friends_work_history`. `array` of objects containing `employer`, `location`, `position`, `start_date` and `end_date` fields.
